title: Speculators Fell in Love—The Market Didn’t: Silver After Valentine’s Day
summary: Historically, post–Valentine’s Day seasonals haven’t shown much love for silver. A short-term dip wouldn’t be surprising. The bigger trend? Still open for debate.

title: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Marathon Petroleum Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Marathon Petroleum has outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

title: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Diamondback Energy Stock?
summary: Diamondback Energy has underperformed the broader market over the past year, but analysts are highly optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

title: What are Global Markets Watching Monday?
summary: Yes, US markets are closed, but world markets continue to trade.
